commitResults.messageTitle: Create Duke chat bot with Greet, Echo and Exit
commitResults.messageBody:
* add Main driver class
* add InputHandler class that processes inputs
* update Duke class to interface with main driver class

commitResults.messageTitle: Add commands List and Add
commitResults.messageBody:
* add command interface for future commands
* add Task class to encapsulate descriptions of tasks
* add TaskList class to encapsulate a list of tasks
* add ListCommand class that lists tasks from TaskList
* add AddCommand class that adds tasks to TaskList
* add ByeCommand class that exits the Duke chat bot

commitResults.messageTitle: Add ability to mark tasks as done
commitResults.messageBody:
* add DoneCommand that marks tasks as done
* update InputHandler to handle done command
* update Task class to encapsulate variables to track completion of tasks
* update TaskList class to handle modification of list of tasks

commitResults.messageTitle: Add support for tracking Todo, Event and Deadline Tasks
commitResults.messageBody:
* update AddCommand class to support three types of tasks
* add DeadlineTask class to encapsulate tasks with deadlines
* add EventTask class to encapsulate tasks with event durations
* add TodoTask class to encapsulate tasks without deadlines or durations
* update InputHandler to support addition of three types of tasks
* update Task class to support inheritance

commitResults.messageTitle: Update text-ui-test to semi-automate testing of Duke chat bot
commitResults.messageBody: * add inputs and expected outputs of simple tests

commitResults.messageTitle: Add ability to handle errors
commitResults.messageBody:
* add DukeException class that represents errors
* update InputHandler to throw DukeExceptions when errors are encountered
* update Duke class to handle DukeExceptions

commitResults.messageTitle: Remove busy waiting that causes input to not terminate
Add support for deleteing tasks from the list
commitResults.messageBody:
* add DeleteCommand class that deletes tasks from taskList
* update InputHandler to support delete command
* update TaskList to support deleting of tasks

commitResults.messageTitle: Add ability to save tasks in the hard disk automatically
commitResults.messageBody:
* create StorageHandler class to encapsulate handling of reading and writing from files
* update AddCommand class to handle saving of files
* update Duke class to handle saving of files

commitResults.messageTitle: Extract AddCommand class into 3 classes
commitResults.messageBody:
* separate AddToDo, AddDeadline and AddEvent classes.
* modify DeadlineTask class to encapsulate java LocalDate format
* update InputHandler class to handle parsing of inputs for java LocalDate format

commitResults.messageTitle: Update DeadlineTask class to display LocalDate with format
Rename InputHandler class and StorageHandler class
commitResults.messageBody:
* rename InputHandler class to Parser to match project requirements
* rename StorageHandler class to Storage to match project requirements

commitResults.messageTitle: Update storage for compatibility with LocalDate format
commitResults.messageBody:
merging branch-Level-7 and branch-level-8 caused Storage class to not be able to handle java LocalDate format

* update DeadlineTask and EventTask to encapsulate serialization of java LocalDate format
* update Storage class to handle reading and writing to and from file with serialized java LocalDate format

commitResults.messageTitle: Create Ui class to encapsulate output handling
Package classes
Add JUnit tests for automated testing
Add java documentation for command package
Restructure project directories
Add java documentation for task package
Update code to follow coding standard
Add support to find task by searching for keyword
Update code to follow styling conventions
Update gradle configuration and add checkstyle
Add GUI using java fx
Add more input validation
Add assertions
Improve code quality
commitResults.messageBody:
* delete unused imports in Duke class
* add enums and refactor methods in Parser class
* refactor methods in Storage class
* remove unused code in Ui class
* improve readability in TaskList class

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix bug that causes text to clip off
commitResults.messageBody:
* replace DialogBox Label type with Text type
* update MainWindow and DialogBox fxml version

commitResults.messageTitle: Add lambda and streams
Update code to follow checkstyle
commitResults.messageBody:
* remove comments in Parser class
* remove unused imports in TaskList class

commitResults.messageTitle: Update help command to match latest functionality
Add ability to detect clashing Deadline Tasks
Update TaskList class to follow styling guide
Fix bug that causes todo task printing incorrectly
commitResults.messageBody:
bug causes the word "todo" to appear along with the description of the task when listed.

Update Parser class to remove the extra string of "todo".

commitResults.messageTitle: Add more input validation
commitResults.messageBody:
* add ability to check for 24hr time format
* update help command to display more information on command formatting

commitResults.messageTitle: Rename Duke chat bot to Antonio chat bot
Update code style to follow checkstyle
Improve format of event task
commitResults.messageBody:
event task now can be specified from a particular start date and time, to an end date and time.

* add InvalidFormatException class that is thrown when an invalid time format is parsed

commitResults.messageTitle: Update Tasks to display 24 hour time format
Update java docs to follow styling conventions
Add user guide
Add representative screenshot
Update user guide to hyperlink to release page
Update README.md
